Intro.altImage: Aleksandr Gumroian on a baseball field, holding a baseball bat and ball in his hands, smiling but looking away. In the background, green grass and a stadium.

AboutPage.title: About me

My main focus is frontend development, particularly with React.

AboutPage.imageAlt: Aleksandr Gumroian standing in sunglasses, the background is out of focus with a cityscape, a river and bridges.
AboutPage.imageCaption: View on Prague from Metronome (Stalin), Czechia - Aug. '21
AboutPage.third: When I‚Äôm not coding, you‚Äôll likely find me outdoors ‚Äî fishing, playing volleyball or ping-pong, walking my dog, tinkering a new DIY project or just exploring new places and spending time with friends.

Skills.title: Skills
Skills.html: The latest HTML standard, introducing semantic tags and multimedia support for modern web.
Skills.css: The newest CSS version, featuring animations, flexbox, grid, and responsive design tools.
Skills.js: A dynamic scripting language for web interactivity, APIs, and frontend/backend development.
Skills.ts: A typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JS, adding static types for better tooling and scalability.
Skills.react: A JavaScript library for building UI components, developed by Meta, using a virtual DOM for efficiency.
Skills.next: A React framework for server-side rendering, static sites, and full-stack web applications.
Skills.vue: A progressive JavaScript framework for building UIs with a simple, flexible architecture.
Skills.redux: A state management library for JavaScript apps, centralizing data flow in complex applications.
Skills.tailwind: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development with pre-defined classes.
Skills.figma: A web-based UI/UX design tool for collaborative design, prototyping, and feedback.
Skills.jest: A JavaScript testing framework focused on simplicity, supporting unit and snapshot testing.
Skills.python: A high-level programming language, widely used in web development, data analysis, and AI.
Skills.node: A JavaScript runtime for server-side development, enabling scalable, event-driven apps.
Skills.mongo: A NoSQL database using flexible, JSON-like documents for high-performance data storage.
Skills.postgresql: A powerful open-source relational database with advanced SQL features and scalability.
Skills.webpack: A module bundler for JavaScript apps, optimizing assets for production deployment.
Skills.git: A distributed version control system for tracking code changes and enabling team collaboration.
Skills.graphql: A query language for APIs and a runtime for executing those queries with your existing data.
Skills.rest: An architectural style for web services using HTTP requests to access and manipulate data.
Skills.motion: A JavaScript library for creating animations and transitions in web applications.
Skills.eslint: A static code analysis tool for identifying and fixing problems in JavaScript/TypeScript code.
Skills.prettier: An opinionated code formatter for consistent code style across JavaScript, TypeScript, and other languages.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description1: Managed and edited content, ensuring accuracy and consistency for big clients like Microsoft and Ford.
Experience.description2: Working on several projects, primarily on the Turris project, which focuses on network security and privacy.
